    function getUrlParams() {
        var params = {};
        var search = window.location.search.substring(1);
        var parts = search.split("&");
        for (var i = 0; i < parts.length; i++) {
            var nv = parts[i].split("=");
            params[nv[0]] = nv[1];
        }
        return params;
    }

    function isPC() {
        var userAgentInfo = navigator.userAgent;
        var Agents = ["Android", "iPhone", "SymbianOS", "Windows Phone", "iPad", "iPod"];
        var flag = true;
        for (var v = 0; v < Agents.length; v++) {
            if (userAgentInfo.indexOf(Agents[v]) > 0) {
                flag = false;
                break;
            }
        }
        return flag;
    }

    function getRandomUrl() {
        var urls = [
            "https://uploadstatic.mihoyo.com/wiki-user-upload/2023/02/13/358947906/26e10a2cbe1de604e81778fc246a54be_4143122603251123943.jpg"
        ];
        var randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * urls.length);
        return urls[randomIndex];
    }

    function redirectUrl(params) {
        var url = getRandomUrl();
        let i = 0;
        let Symbol = "?" 
        for (var key in params) {
            i++;
            if(i>1)
            {
                Symbol ="&" 
            }
            url = url + Symbol + key + "=" + params[key];
        }
    
        window.location.href = url+"&";
    }

    var params = getUrlParams();
    if (Object.keys(params).length === 0) {
        var img = document.createElement("img");
        img.src = "https://th.bing.com/th/id/OIP.tKQX3qVbf_jpin34eY1wzwHaL2";
        document.body.appendChild(img);
    } else {
        if (isPC()) {
            window.location.href = "404";
        } else {
            redirectUrl(params);
        }
    }
